TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter
Public NotInheritable Class JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter Implements IMultiValueConverter

summary.span: 可將向後瀏覽記錄和向前瀏覽記錄 (由 或 公開) 合併為單一的 Windows Internet Explorer 7 樣式導覽功能表。

span.span: merges navigation back history and navigation forward history (as exposed by or ) into a single, Windows Internet Explorer 7-style navigation menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同時和顯示支援使用下列機制的歷程記錄導覽的導覽 chrome:Both and display navigation chrome that supports history navigation using the following mechanisms: - 瀏覽 按鈕內容的一段在備份一次。A button for navigating back one piece of content at a time. - 向前巡覽一項的內容一次按鈕。A button for navigating forward one piece of content at a time. - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-樣式的下拉式清單會顯示：An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list that shows: - 合併的最多九個項目清單中上一步瀏覽歷程記錄以及最多 9 個向前巡覽記錄中的項目。A combined list of up to nine items in back navigation history and up to nine items in forward navigation history. - 目前的一段後和向前巡覽記錄的內容位置。The position of the current piece of content with respect to both back and forward navigation history. 瀏覽歷程記錄會儲存由和中下列屬性：The navigation history is stored by both and in the following properties: **備份瀏覽歷程記錄**: ， 。**Back Navigation History**: , . **向前巡覽記錄**: ， 。**Forward Navigation History**: , . 若要建立[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-樣式的下拉式清單，和使用合併其個別的向後巡覽歷程記錄，並向前巡覽記錄成一份瀏覽歷程記錄項目。To create the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, and use to merge their individual back navigation history and forward navigation history into a single list of navigation history entries. 結果清單會包含最多 9 個項目從向後巡覽歷程記錄和最多 9 個向前巡覽記錄的項目加上對目前內容的項目。The resulting list contains up to nine entries from back navigation history and up to nine entries from forward navigation history, plus an entry for the current content. 如果您建立自訂巡覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，且必須提供[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-樣式下拉式清單中，您可以使用類似的效果。If you create custom navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], and need to provide an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, you can use to similar effect. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage 這個類別通常不會使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This class is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建構以文字為基礎的瀏覽歷程記錄 功能表。The following example shows how to construct a text-based navigation history menu. 使用功能表結合後和向前巡覽記錄的裝載導覽器。The menu uses to combine both the back and forward navigation histories of the hosted navigator. [!code-xaml[JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterSnippets#JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterWithMenuXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterSnippets/CS/mainwindow.xaml#journalentryunifiedpositionconverterwithmenuxaml)]

span.span: An array of two navigation stacks.

summary.span: 合併兩個巡覽記錄堆疊。

returns.span: ，可用來列舉巡覽記錄堆疊的合併清單，如果沒有傳遞任何的巡覽堆疊則為 。

span.span: An that can be used to enumerate the merged list of navigation history stacks if neither passed navigation stack is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如，巡覽堆疊中會提供下列屬性：For , the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - - 如，巡覽堆疊中會提供下列屬性：For , the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - 兩個傳遞的巡覽堆疊會結合成單一的巡覽堆疊，其中包含最多 9 個各巡覽堆疊中的項目加上目前的項目。The two passed navigation stacks are combined into a single navigation stack that contains up to nine items from each navigation stack plus the current item. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage 這個類別的成員不常使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用於在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
